name: kelamayi Upgrade Broom and Dustpan Set, Large Size and Stiff Broom Dust pan with Long Handle, Upright,Ideal for Indoor Outdoor Garage Kitchen Room Office Lobby Use (Green)
about_this_item: Extendable Pole Design: The optional extension pole makes the broom length from 38.18 to 50.39 inches, People can choose the appropriate length according to their height. And long handle allow you to Stand upright for comfortable sweeping. NO MORE BENDING!

Heavy duty Broom bristles: Upgraded four-row bristles design, high quality broom bristle construction, More dense and durable. Eco-friendly fiber made from recycled PET bottles. Kelamayi insists on working hard to protect the environment.

Easy Stand-up Storage: The clip-on feature makes the broom and dustpan upright a perfect space safer! Compact storage keep your home or work space clean and tidy. Works perfectly for multi-surface, Suitable for indoor use.

Self-Cleaning Dustpan Teeth: Built in scraper and comb/Teeth for easy to Clean Broom into Dustpan , Clean Pet Hair and Human Hair with one Pull on the Teeth. The rubber lip of the dust pan is flush with the floor and the teeth clean out the bristles easily.
Our mission: Make your live cleaner, and make your housework easier.

content: Love the color and sleek design.  Feels a bit stiff to maneuver.

title: Verified Purchase
content: I really love the light green color and it nice enough to store in a corner instead of storing it in a closet. It is smaller than I thought, but works fine for light sweeping. Assembling was not difficult, but wished that the manufacturer would have added stickers to naming the separate poles. Bagging a single combined assortment of poles that were A1 through A3 and then B1 through B4 is not the best friendly user kind of instructions.

title: Verified Purchase
content: I had a very old IKEA waist high sweeper set, which had a comfortable ergonomic handle (which I miss) - this new sweeper set is a little taller than I would prefer (and I have it on the shortest setting) - I wish the manufacturer would shorten by at least 3 more inches (and I am 5’7” tall, so I am not short!) and consider a more comfortable and ergonomic handle (so we don’t have to twist our wrists as much while sweeping.)  With that said, I do like the hard and sturdy bristles on the brush, and the fact it’s so narrow, it get in cracks well. I don’t think the “hair remover” comb on the base is necessary. I still have to manually pull off residual long hairs, so it’s not very efficient. I do like the deep well that debris goes into, and it’s easy to empty its contents into the trash. I wish you would consider even more colors to choose from. A light gray color would be nice (I have the dark gray.)
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on May 30, 2024
